title: Currency Converter
description: Users input an amount and choose a currency, prompting an API call for the exchange rate. The tool then computes and shows the converted amount, providing a handy currency converter in the Chrome browser.

title: Vue Expense Tracker
description: An application using Vue 3 and its Composition API, enabling users to seamlessly manage expenses and income with features like adding/removing entries, tracking real-time balances, and locally storing data.

title: Pixel Art
description: Users can craft pixel art with customizable colors for both pen and background, utilize a color grabber, fill shapes with chosen colors, employ a rainbow pen for randomized hues, and apply shading and lightening effects that adapt to background color alterations, all within grids up to 60 x 60 in size.
